alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and southwestern Spartanburg Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenville Downtown, or over Greenville Eastside, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Mauldin, Taylors, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Welcome and Donaldson Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
